name: Badger Bolt
description:
Official Ludum Dare Entry Page

Badger Bolt is a short game where you play a racing badger! Unfortunately, those pesky rabbits have seen fit to give you a 10 second handicap.. 

- Click in the game view and press ENTER to go full screen.
- Arrow keys or WSAD to move (well, A+D), SPACE to jump.

Credits
- Made in Unity 3d
- Art, code, sfx by Steve Salmond
- Music generated with the excellent Otomata
